long_description: Don't get caught in the cold outdoors without a fire. The Klipp Lighter from Ultimate Survival Technologies lights reliably up to 30,000 times and includes a carabiner to keep it close at hand. Windproof turbo flame with piezoelectric ignition offers consistent lighting even in wet, windy conditions. Uses butane fuel (not included); fuel capacity is .04 oz. Locking carabiner design allows easy attachment to packs, gear or keychains.
short_description: Don't get caught in the cold outdoors without a fire. The Klipp Lighter from Ultimate Survival Technologies lights reliably up to 30,000 times and includes a carabiner to keep it close at hand.
